record.name: validate CI list when save update plan

rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript to validate is there duplicate CI in list
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Current Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">CMDB Update</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript to validate is there duplicate CI in list (when ( Current Phase in CurrentRecord = "CMDB Update"))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var ret1=lib.RequestTaskService.isDuplicate(record.CIListContext);\u000aif(ret1.ret){\u000a returnCode = 1; \u000a message=system.functions.scmsg( \"11\", \"requestTask\",[ret1.retstr]); \u000a msgType=\"screen\";\u000a cursorPosition = \"CIListContext\";\u000a}\u000a\u000aif(record.category != \"Purchase\"){\u000a var ret2=lib.RequestTaskService.isDuplicate(record.CIListCMDB);\u000a if(ret2.ret){\u000a returnCode = 1; \u000a message=system.functions.scmsg( \"11\", \"requestTask\",[ret2.retstr]); \u000a msgType=\"screen\";\u000a cursorPosition = \"CIListCMDB\";\u000a }\u000a}"}

rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript to validate is there any reference of CI is not existing in addtional properties
rule.condition: current.phase in $L.file="CMDB Update" and not (same(category in $L.file, "Purchase"))
rule.conditionDesc: ( Current Phase in CurrentRecord = "CMDB Update" AND Category in CurrentRecord != "Purchase")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Current Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">CMDB Update</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Purchase</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript to validate is there any reference of CI is not existing in addtional properties (when ( Current Phase in CurrentRecord = "CMDB Update" AND Category in CurrentRecord != "Purchase"))

rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript to validate any duplicate serial number existing
rule.condition: current.phase in $L.file="CMDB Update" and category in $L.file="Purchase"
rule.conditionDesc: ( Current Phase in CurrentRecord = "CMDB Update" AND Category in CurrentRecord = "Purchase")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Current Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">CMDB Update</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Purchase</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript to validate any duplicate serial number existing (when ( Current Phase in CurrentRecord = "CMDB Update" AND Category in CurrentRecord = "Purchase"))

rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript to validate is any CI reference is existing in CMDB
rule.condition: current.phase in $L.file="CMDB Update" and category in $L.file="Purchase"
rule.conditionDesc: ( Current Phase in CurrentRecord = "CMDB Update" AND Category in CurrentRecord = "Purchase")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Current Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">CMDB Update</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Purchase</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript to validate is any CI reference is existing in CMDB (when ( Current Phase in CurrentRecord = "CMDB Update" AND Category in CurrentRecord = "Purchase"))

rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript to validate is any CI reference is not existing in CMDB
rule.condition: current.phase in $L.file="CMDB Update" and not (same(category in $L.file, "Purchase"))
rule.conditionDesc: ( Current Phase in CurrentRecord = "CMDB Update" AND Category in CurrentRecord != "Purchase")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Current Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">CMDB Update</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Purchase</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript to validate is any CI reference is not existing in CMDB (when ( Current Phase in CurrentRecord = "CMDB Update" AND Category in CurrentRecord != "Purchase"))
